isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - Meritor Transfer Cases MTC-4208, -4210, and -4213 - Power Take-Off (PTO) - Install Yoke Onto PTO

svcproc.title: Install Yoke Onto PTO
svcproc.para: You must install a Meritor yoke with the spline code 'RAI' onto the PTO. For yoke options, refer to Table 5 and Figure 69.

step1.para: Use a press and an applied press force of 500-1500 lbs (227-680 kg) to install a Meritor yoke (spline code RAI) onto the PTO shaft (Figure 68).
Apply a 1.8-inch (46 mm) bead of RTV silicone gasket material around the end of the yoke spline under the washer surface.
Install the washer and locknut supplied in the kit. Tighten the locknut to 700-900 lb-ft (949-1220 Nm).
